summary.overview: The CAVW transaction provides account inquiry functionality for the CardDemo application, allowing users to view comprehensive account details including balances, credit limits, and associated customer information. The transaction integrates with the main menu system and requires user authentication through the sign-on process.
business_functions: User Authentication and Session Validation - Verify user credentials and establish secure session
Main Menu Navigation - Display available options and route users to selected functions
Account ID Input and Validation - Accept and validate account number entry from users
Account Information Retrieval - Look up account details from master files and cross-reference data
Customer Information Display - Show associated customer details linked to the account
Account Status and Balance Display - Present current account status, available balance, and credit limits
Account History Information - Display account opening dates and last activity information
Error Handling and User Feedback - Provide appropriate messages for invalid inputs or missing data
Screen Navigation and Exit Processing - Handle user navigation between screens and return to menu

CAVW.program_overview: Account View - Displays comprehensive account details and customer information
Main Menu - Provides navigation interface for regular users
User Sign-on - Handles user authentication and access control
Admin Menu - Provides administrative menu interface for admin users

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: User security file used to authenticate user credentials by reading user ID and password information

datasource_summary.name: Account Master Data File (ACCTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Read account master data by account ID to retrieve account details like balance, credit limit, status, and dates

datasource_summary.name: Customer Master Data File (CUSTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Read customer master data by customer ID to retrieve customer personal information like name, address, SSN, phone numbers

datasource_summary.name: Card Cross-Reference Index File (CXACAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Read card cross-reference data by account ID to find associated customer ID and card number for the account
